A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star wars has been officially disney-fied.  Which is a bad thing.  The plot closely resembles a \"Pirates of the Caribbean\" movie.  Which is another way of saying \"it's just a bunch of stuff that happens\" or \"switch your brain off and get ready to be entertained\".  Also sad to see a star wars movie mocking the jedi religion.  How can star wars ever be taken seriously after this?
